name: The Warlock's Tower
description:
WATCH OUT! This game is unfinished.

The Flash version has various text-related issues that aren't present in the Windows version. View this as a demo. It's over after 10 days and there's nothing you can do about it. Yet.

GOAL:

Build the tower.

CONTROLS:

Space / Enter: Confirm

Arrows / WASD: Select

Shift: Abort

Escape: Reset.

#zxsequeljam #towerjam
